title: Exchange of Gases
question: Exchange of gases is due to / Pertukaran gas mengikut
气体进出肺泡/微血管的process / process
哪个是cellular respiration / respirasi sel
A: Glucose + oxygen → carbon dioxide + water + energy / Glukosa + oksigen → karbon dioksida + air + tenaga
B: Glucose + nitrogen → carbon dioxide + water + energy / Glukosa + nitrogen → karbon dioksida + air + tenaga
C: Glucose + oxygen → ethanol + carbon dioxide + energy / Glukosa + oksigen → etanol + karbon dioksida + tenaga
D: Water + oxygen → glucose + carbon dioxide + energy / Air + oksigen → glukosa + karbon dioksida + tenaga

question: Adaptations of the alveolar structure / Adaptasi struktur alveolus
C: one cell thick / ketebalan satu sel
D: one cell thin / kenipisan satu sel

question: Adaptations of the alveolar structure / Adaptasi struktur alveolus
C: large surface area / luas permukaan yang besar
D: small surface area / luas permukaan yang kecil

question: Adaptations of the alveolar structure / Adaptasi struktur alveolus
A: covered by a compact network of capillaries / diliputi jaringan kapilari yang padat
B: Lined with thick layers of cells / Dilapisi oleh lapisan sel yang tebal
C: Contain large muscles for contraction / Mengandungi otot besar untuk pengecutan
D: impermeable to gases / Tidak telap kepada gas

question: alveolus
A: higher concentration of oxygen / kepekatan oksigen yang tinggi
B: lower concentration of oxygen / kepekatan oksigen yang rendah
C: higher concentration of carbon dioxide / kepekatan karbon dioksida yang tinggi
D: lower concentration of carbon dioxide / kepekatan karbon dioksida yang rendah
